contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox officeholder | name = Inese Vaidere | image = | imagesize = | caption = | office = [[Member of the European Parliament]] for [[Latvia (European Parliament constituency)|Latvia]] | term_start = 2004 | term_end = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1952|09|03|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Jelgava]] | death_date = | death_place = | nationality = | spouse = | party = [[Civic Union (Latvia)|Civic Union]], [[European People's Party (European Parliament group)|European People's Party]] | relations = | children = | residence = | alma_mater = | occupation = | profession = | religion = | signature = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Inese Vaidere''' (born September 3, 1952 in [[Jelgava]])<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.europarl.europa.eu/members/expert/searchForm/view.do?id=28617&language=en |title=Your MEPs : Inese VAIDERE |publisher=[[European Parliament]] |accessdate=2010-04-07}}</ref> is a [[Latvia]]n politician, serving as a [[Member of the European Parliament]] (since 2004). She was formerly Vice-Mayor of [[Riga]] and member of the [[Saeima]]. She was elected to the [[European Parliament]] in 2004 for the [[For Fatherland and Freedom/LNNK]] list; part of the [[Union for a Europe of Nations]] group. In 2009, she was elected from the [[Civic Union (Latvia)]] list; part of the [[European People's Party (European Parliament group)|EPP group]]. She is a signatory of the [[Prague Declaration on European Conscience and Communism]].<ref name="moresignatures">{{cite web |url= http://praguedeclaration.org/vipsig |title= Prague Declaration: Selected signatories |author= |date= |work= |publisher= [[Institute for Information on the Crimes of Communism]] | archiveurl = | archivedate = |accessdate= 2011-05-10 | quote = }}</ref> == References == {{Reflist}} {{Members of the European Parliament 2004–2009}} {{Latvia MEPs 2009–2014}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Vaidere, Inese | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Latvian politician | DATE OF BIRTH = September 3, 1952 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Jelgava]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vaidere, Inese}} [[Category:Civic Union (Latvia) politicians]] [[Category:For Fatherland and Freedom/LNNK politicians]] [[Category:1952 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Jelgava]] [[Category:For Fatherland and Freedom/LNNK MEPs]] [[Category:Civic Union (Latvia) MEPs]] [[Category:MEPs for Latvia 2004–2009]] [[Category:MEPs for Latvia 2009–2014]] [[Category:Female MEPs for Latvia]] [[Category:Prague Declaration on European Conscience and Communism signatories]] {{MEP-stub}} {{Latvia-politician-stub}}
